about_the_game:
Step into the chilling corridors of the Toronto Lunatic Asylum, where the echoes of the past linger in the shadows. Set in the late Victorian Era of downtown Toronto, Canada, Buried Spirits is a gripping historical horror experience that immerses players in a world defined by fear, tragedy, and the dark consequences of ignorance.

As you navigate the eerie, dimly lit halls of the abandoned asylum, you’ll uncover the haunting stories of three patients who fell victim to medical malpractice and society’s cruel perceptions. Each ghostly narrative unfolds as you explore the now ruined halls, piecing together the tragic fates that befell them.

But beware—something sinister lurks in the darkness. A terrifying, black-robed predator roams the decaying building, stalking you as you dive deeper into the asylum’s secrets. Stealth and strategy are your allies as you evade this relentless monster, adding a heart-pounding layer of tension to your exploration.

With stunning environment design that captures the haunting atmosphere of a bygone era, Buried Spirits offers a unique blend of horror and history, culminating in a shocking twist that will leave you questioning reality. Will you uncover the truth, or will you become another lost soul trapped within these haunted walls?

content_descriptors.notes: Buried Spirits makes references and insinuations of homophobia, misogyny, abuse, and suicide. These themes are based on real-life historical evidence of the time period. These topics may be triggering to some individuals.

Minimum:

  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
